Horizon.md - Remember Everything You Read

Turn passive browsing into active thinking. Horizon.md transforms how you experience the web by letting you capture, organize, and share your thoughts directly where they happen.

Key Features:
- ✨ Highlight any text, image, or video directly on any webpage
- 📝 Add notes and thoughts in real-time as you browse
- 🔄 Instant sync with your personal Horizon.md profile
- 🌐 Build your personal knowledge network
- 🎨 Create beautiful blog posts from your highlights
- 🔒 Choose what to keep private and what to share

Why Horizon.md?
Don't let valuable insights disappear into the void of endless scrolling. Every highlight you make and every note you take builds your personal web of knowledge. Connect with others who think like you through our unique network visualization.

Perfect for:
- Writers collecting research and inspiration
- Students taking study notes
- Researchers gathering sources
- Content creators organizing ideas
- Anyone who wants to remember what they read

Stop forgetting. Start connecting. Join the Horizon.md community of conscious digital thinkers.

No account required for now.
